name: NEVRDEAD
description:
"For nearly a millennia, heaven and hell have been at balance. The horrors of hell were confined in anguish while peace blossomed across the known world. Only mortals could disturb this balance, for which mortals will only come to repent.." Nevalem

NEVRDEAD is a old school, run-and-gun styled shooter inspired by great classics such as; Duke Nukem, Goldeneye, and Doom. There is more that meets the eye though in this world, skill progression, base building, or just slaughtering the hordes - the choice is yours. Hell maybe if your strong enough you could possibly find an end to it all, a prophecy in which it began. Just survive, that's all that matters because you only got one life.

BEFORE YOU BUY
This game is in early access! Things may not work properly and the game may crash. Graphics quality/resolution adjustment may improve game play experience. If you wish to proceed in purchasing the game, please join the community here on Steam and help improve this game! Please report bugs/glitches to the referenced contact email to have them quickly addressed and fixed.
IN-GAME
  • 3D antagonists currently use placeholder models, art design is still ongoing
  • Terrain, buildings, scenery does not represent the final product in any way, most of what is seen is subject to change. ex: repeating buildings, trees, etc.
  • Performance/optimizations


LOOK FORWARD TO
  • A larger, open world with vast areas to explore and build upon!
  • An new art direction that will dramatically change the game!
  • More weapons, build options, enemy types, skills, and much, much more!
